resources.string: Please define a new master password
Initialisation succeeded, you may now login\nPlease enter your master password
Fields have been modified\nclick CANCEL to close without saving
Password should not have\nleading or trailing white-space
Specify the export filename to be written into directory:\n
Access to public storage has previously been denied\nGo to settings/apps/eskey to grant permission
Access to public storage not permitted
The external storage media is not available for read/write access\nPerhaps it is not mounted
Select the storage type.\nPrivate storage needs adb/root to access.\nPublic storage requires granting STORAGE permission
